msbt.message: Even a crouton like me enjoys Bunny Day. How about you? You feelin' festive?
You seen that Zipper fella out in the plaza? He's the one's been hidin' eggs everywhere these last few days.I don't know where he finds the energy,

I'm glad you came by, but why aren't you out there russlin' up some candy eggs? It's Bunny Day, kiddo!You dillydally too much and there may not be any eggs left for you to find, !Y'know, it'd sure be nice if the eggs would come to you for a change. No more breaking your back searchin'!

Hey, you had any stone eggs come out of rocks lately? 'Cause I sure have. And it ain't just here either.I had a chinwag with Wilbur and he mentioned the most peculiar thingHe flew someone to one of those Nook Miles Ticket islands and saw eggs comin' from rocks all willy-nilly!What's the world coming to when you start gettin' eggs out of rocks, ? I swear
Ever heard that old tune about how you can get eggs out of coconut trees around Bunny Day?Well, get this. I went out and gave a coconut tree a whack, and whaddaya know! It's true, !

Well, , Bunny Day is nigh. , I believe.AhI remember when I was just a little and Bunny Day was about throwin' eggs at your pals.Now it's all about makin' stuff with eggs. I miss the excitement, but I don't miss the welts. Gahaha!
